INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_HOLD_STK_TXN (AC_HOLD_STK_TXN_ID, IS_RELSE, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.acHoldStkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isRelse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
